mapper.insert: insert into db_mytool (SEQUENCEID, IFNUM, PAYMENT, ENDTIME, NUM, 'NAME', RESERVE1, RESERVE2, CREATETIME, EPASSWD) values (#{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ifnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{num,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{epasswd,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update db_mytool set IFNUM = #{ifnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAYMENT = #{payment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENDTIME = #{endtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NUM = #{num,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, 'NAME' = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EPASSWD = #{epasswd,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, IFNUM, PAYMENT, ENDTIME, NUM, 'NAME', RESERVE1, RESERVE2, CREATETIME, EPASSWD from db_mytool where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select SEQUENCEID, IFNUM, PAYMENT, ENDTIME, NUM, 'NAME', RESERVE1, RESERVE2, CREATETIME, EPASSWD from db_mytool
